channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK

(Replicating questions 14-29) Aerosols//haz class 2.1 // UN 1950//not shipped as hazardous waste//not toxic by inhalation//not shipped under Exemption, Approval, or CA number//shipment was undeclared with no release//packaging type non-bulk/outer packaging fiberboard box//

item.title: Report X-2024121321
item.description:
Report X-2024121321

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T00:58:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On Dec 10th during the PM sort a package was found leaking. The package was marked as ID8000 Consumer Commodity, 9 and contained 5 bottles of perfume. The package was placed into a salvage drum and is pending and amended shippers declaration from the shipper.
